original_title: The Distant Shores: A Surf Odyssey to the Ends of the Earth
overview: True Blue Travel digs this new film released by Surfer Magazine. Distant Shores, a short film about surfers traveling to the end of the earth, in search of some of the world’s most remote line-ups, for perfect and uncrowded waves. For anyone planning a surf trip or sitting in your office needing some inspiration, this 16 minute movie is a must see!  The movie stars a strong cast and locations including Tom Lowe and Fergal Smith in Ireland, Kepa Acero in the Namibian desert, Chile and Alaska, all time Norway, and Indo’s new hottest coral green outpost, Panaitan’s Apocalypse.Also boasts one awesome soundtrack that will definitely get you keen to hit the water.
